titles.title: A resolution commending Blue Mountain Christian University for 150 years of service to the State of Mississippi and the United States.
A resolution commending Blue Mountain Christian University for 150 years of service to the State of Mississippi and the United States.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution commends Blue Mountain Christian University for its 150 years of service to Mississippi and the United States. It also recognizes Blue Mountain Christian University for its academic, faith-based, and athletic excellence.
